alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 01 at 3:57AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Occasional blizzard conditions. No additional accumulations expected but areas of blowing snow will still reduce the visibility to a quarter mile or less in open areas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dickinson County. In Minnesota, Nobles and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
